properties.description:
We'll always run as incremental

- Parameters:
["{'schema': 'SCAE', 'table':'CICLO_TURMA','load_type':'incremental','partition_column':'null', 'control_column':'DAT_ALTERACAO', 'control_column_type_2_db':'datetime', 'control_column_default_value': '19000101000000', 'control_column_mask_value': 'DD/MM/YYHH24:MI:SSFF', 'columns': 'COD_CICLO,COD_TURMA,DAT_VINCULO,COD_RESPONSAVEL,IND_STATUS,DAT_ALTERACAO,COD_RESPONSAVEL_ALTERACAO', 'raw': {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'YEAR', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'YEAR\\', functions.year(functions.col(\\'DAT_ALTERACAO\\')))'}, {'col_name': 'MONTH', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'MONTH\\', functions.month(functions.col(\\'DAT_ALTERACAO\\')))'}]}}"]

This objetc is ~250MB in size. You can user coalesce(4) for partitions to be about 128MB in size.
